sys_ui_page.html:
Safety Scripted API

The Safety Scripted API provides methods for interacting with data from the Safety application including:
  • GET sa_getinfo: Get aggregate (count) information for records for a specific user from the Safety table. The records are grouped by Request type. The response includes the total number of Safety records for the user (integer), the count of Safety records for each Request type (array of objects), and user information (object).
